  • 方法详细资料

    • findQuestionsByExamPaperId

      @Select("SELECT * FROM question WHERE exam_paper_id = #{examPaperId} ORDER BY number") @Result(property="id",column="id") @Result(property="questionType",column="question_type") @Result(property="type",column="type") @Result(property="content",column="content") @Result(property="number",column="number") @Result(property="examPaperId",column="exam_paper_id") @Result(property="correctAnswer",column="correct_answer") @Result(property="optionA",column="optiona") @Result(property="optionB",column="optionb") @Result(property="optionC",column="optionc") @Result(property="optionD",column="optiond") @TypeDiscriminator(column="question_type",javaType=String.class,cases={@Case(value="SINGLE_CHOICE",type=SingleChoiceQuestion.class),@Case(value="JUDGE",type=JudgeQuestion.class)}) List<Question> findQuestionsByExamPaperId(Long examPaperId)

    • findQuestionsByExamPaperIdOLd

      @Select({"<script>","SELECT id, question_type, type, content, number, exam_paper_id, correct_answer","<if test='\"SINGLE_CHOICE\".equals(questionType)'>",",optiona, optionb, optionc, optiond","</if>","FROM question WHERE exam_paper_id = #{examPaperId} ORDER BY number","</script>"}) @Result(property="id",column="id") @Result(property="questionType",column="question_type") @Result(property="type",column="type") @Result(property="content",column="content") @Result(property="number",column="number") @Result(property="examPaperId",column="exam_paper_id") @Result(property="correctAnswer",column="correct_answer") @Result(property="optionA",column="optiona") @Result(property="optionB",column="optionb") @Result(property="optionC",column="optionc") @Result(property="optionD",column="optiond") List<Question> findQuestionsByExamPaperIdOLd(Long examPaperId)

    • insertQuestion

      @Insert({"<script>","INSERT INTO question (question_type, type, content, number, exam_paper_id, ","<if test='questionType == \"SINGLE_CHOICE\"'>","optiona, optionb, optionc, optiond, ","</if>","correct_answer) ","VALUES (#{questionType}, #{type}, #{content}, #{number}, #{examPaperId}, ","<if test='questionType == \"SINGLE_CHOICE\"'>","#{optionA}, #{optionB}, #{optionC}, #{optionD}, ","</if>","#{correctAnswer})","</script>"}) @Options(useGeneratedKeys=true, keyProperty="id") int insertQuestion(Question question)

    • findQuestionByExamPaperIdAndNumber

      @Select("SELECT * FROM question WHERE exam_paper_id = #{examPaperId} AND number = #{number}") @Result(property="id",column="id") @Result(property="questionType",column="question_type") @Result(property="type",column="type") @Result(property="content",column="content") @Result(property="number",column="number") @Result(property="examPaperId",column="exam_paper_id") @Result(property="correctAnswer",column="correct_answer") @Result(property="optionA",column="optiona") @Result(property="optionB",column="optionb") @Result(property="optionC",column="optionc") @Result(property="optionD",column="optiond") @TypeDiscriminator(column="question_type",javaType=String.class,cases={@Case(value="SINGLE_CHOICE",type=SingleChoiceQuestion.class),@Case(value="JUDGE",type=JudgeQuestion.class)}) Question findQuestionByExamPaperIdAndNumber(@Param("examPaperId") Long examPaperId, @Param("number") int number)

    • findSCByExamPaperId

      @Select("SELECT * FROM question WHERE exam_paper_id = #{examPaperId} AND question_type = 'SINGLE_CHOICE'") @Result(property="id",column="id") @Result(property="content",column="content") @Result(property="number",column="number") @Result(property="correctAnswer",column="correct_answer") @Result(property="optionA",column="optiona") @Result(property="optionB",column="optionb") @Result(property="optionC",column="optionc") @Result(property="optionD",column="optiond") List<SingleChoiceQuestion> findSCByExamPaperId(Long examPaperId)

    • findJQByExamPaperId

      @Select("SELECT * FROM question WHERE exam_paper_id = #{examPaperId} AND question_type = 'JUDGE'") @Result(property="id",column="id") @Result(property="content",column="content") @Result(property="number",column="number") @Result(property="correctAnswer",column="correct_answer") List<JudgeQuestion> findJQByExamPaperId(Long examPaperId)
      根据试卷ID查询所有判断题
      参数:
      examPaperId - 试卷ID
      返回:
      判断题列表

    • findWrongQuestionsBySubject

      @Select(" SELECT q.id, ep.exam_paper_name,q.content,utrd.correct_answer,utrd.user_answer, q.number\n FROM question q\n JOIN exam_paper ep ON q.exam_paper_id = ep.id\n JOIN user_test_record utr ON utr.exam_paper_id = ep.id\n JOIN user_test_record_detail utrd ON (\n utrd.test_id = utr.test_id\n AND utrd.question_number = q.number\n )\n JOIN subjects s ON ep.exam_paper_subject = s.subject_name\n WHERE s.subject_id = #{subjectId} AND utr.user_id = #{userId}\n AND utrd.user_answer != utrd.correct_answer\n") @Result(property="questionId",column="id") @Result(property="examPaperName",column="exam_paper_name") @Result(property="content",column="content") @Result(property="correctAnswer",column="correct_answer") @Result(property="userAnswer",column="user_answer") @Result(property="number",column="number") List<QuestionWrongDTO> findWrongQuestionsBySubject(@Param("subjectId") int subjectId, @Param("userId") Long userId)

    • findQuestionsByIds

      @Select(" <script>\n SELECT * FROM question WHERE id IN\n <foreach item=\"id\" collection=\"ids\" open=\"(\" separator=\",\" close=\")\">\n #{id}\n </foreach>\n ORDER BY number\n </script>\n") @Result(property="id",column="id") @Result(property="questionType",column="question_type") @Result(property="type",column="type") @Result(property="content",column="content") @Result(property="number",column="number") @Result(property="examPaperId",column="exam_paper_id") @Result(property="correctAnswer",column="correct_answer") @Result(property="optionA",column="optiona") @Result(property="optionB",column="optionb") @Result(property="optionC",column="optionc") @Result(property="optionD",column="optiond") @TypeDiscriminator(column="question_type",javaType=String.class,cases={@Case(value="SINGLE_CHOICE",type=SingleChoiceQuestion.class),@Case(value="JUDGE",type=JudgeQuestion.class)}) List<Question> findQuestionsByIds(@Param("ids") List<Long> ids)

    • deleteByExamPaperId

      @Delete("DELETE FROM examinai.question WHERE exam_paper_id = #{examPaperId}") void deleteByExamPaperId(@Param("examPaperId") Long examPaperId)
